snippet: The University of Cincinnati officer, Raymond Tensing, “was not justified in using deadly force” in a July traffic stop, a university consultant said.
abstract: Security firm hired by University of Cincinnati releases report finding deadly traffic stop shooting of Samuel DuBose was unjustified; body camera on Officer Raymond Tensing, who faces murder charges, contradicts original claims.
lead_paragraph: The University of Cincinnati officer, Raymond Tensing, “was not justified in using deadly force” in a July traffic stop, a university consultant said.

headline.main: Ohio: Report Says Killing by Officer Was Preventable
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Report Says Killing by Officer Was Preventable
